about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the darkness of an enigmatic apartment where every shadow hides a terrifying secret. Embark on a breathtaking quest to discover the truth behind a sinister presence that stalks you at every step.

In this immersive horror game, you play as Joel who wakes up with no memories in an unfamiliar apartment. As you explore the dark and dilapidated rooms, disturbing clues reveal traces of an ancient crime involving a mysteriously missing child. But be careful, you are not alone...

Use your ingenuity and courage to escape this omnipresent threat and solve the mystery that haunts these places. The line between reality and nightmare is blurring, and every decision you make can bring you closer to the truth or your end.

Do you dare to discover what the darkness hides?


An oppressive atmosphere, immersive graphics and soundtrack will immerse you in a frightening atmosphere.


Game duration: 45-60min

name: Forget

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in a living nightmare where every dark corner of the apartment hides terrifying secrets. Wake up without memories, Pursued by an enigmatic presence, and discover the truth about a missing child. Reality or illusion? It's up to you to unravel the inexplicable.
supported_languages:
English, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
